name: Knight of the Reliquary
oracle_text: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Caravan Escort
oracle_text: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
LEVEL 5+
First strike

name: Lionheart Maverick
oracle_text: Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

name: Knight of Cliffhaven
oracle_text: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
Flying
LEVEL 4+
Flying, vigilance

name: Knight of Meadowgrain
oracle_text: First strike
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

name: Knight of the White Orchid
oracle_text: First strike

When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Both guide and guard on open plain.

name: Leonin Skyhunter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

name: Silver Knight
oracle_text: First strike, protection from red
flavor_text: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

name: White Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor_text: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

name: Knotvine Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
flavor_text:
"He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Steward of Valeron
oracle_text: Vigilance
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

name: Benalish Lancer
oracle_text: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

name: Zhalfirin Commander
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Knight Exemplar
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavor_text: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

name: Kabira Vindicator
oracle_text: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-4
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
LEVEL 5+
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
oracle_text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
flavor_text: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

name: Alaborn Cavalier
oracle_text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"
—Alaborn soldier

name: Skyhunter Patrol
oracle_text: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."
—Raksha Golden Cub

name: Plover Knights
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

name: Juniper Order Ranger
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
flavor_text: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

name: Paladin of Prahv
oracle_text: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life.

Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

name: Harm's Way
oracle_text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.
flavor_text: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

name: Reciprocate
oracle_text: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
flavor_text:
"Just as the noble soul calls virtue to itself, the evil soul summons harm."
—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Edge of Autumn
oracle_text: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Reprisal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "Fear this no more!"

name: Test of Faith
oracle_text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

name: Heroes' Reunion
oracle_text: Target player gains 7 life.
flavor_text:
"You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?"
—Eladamri, to Gerrard

name: Sigil Blessing
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

name: Loxodon Warhammer
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.
Equip {3}
flavor_text:
"Tusks to splinter skulls. Steel to shatter scale."
—Warhammer inscription

name: Spidersilk Armor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Griffin Guide
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
When enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Grasslands
oracle_text: Grasslands enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Grasslands: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Sejiri Steppe
oracle_text: Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.
When Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
{T}: Add {W}.

name: Selesnya Sanctuary
oracle_text: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{W}.

name: Treetop Village
oracle_text: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.

{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Bogardan Hellkite
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

name: Cinder Wall
oracle_text: Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

name: Skirk Prospector
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R}.
flavor_text:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Bloodmark Mentor
oracle_text: Red creatures you control have first strike.
flavor_text: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

name: Fire-Belly Changeling
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
—Auntie Wort

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
oracle_text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

name: Dragon Whelp
oracle_text: Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Henge Guardian
oracle_text: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

name: Voracious Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

name: Bogardan Rager
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Mordant Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Mordant Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target creature that player controls.

name: Kilnmouth Dragon
oracle_text: Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying
{T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to any target.

name: Shivan Hellkite
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: A dragon's scale can be carved into a mighty shield, provided you can procure a dragontooth to cut it.

name: Thunder Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

name: Armillary Sphere
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Dragon's Claw
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

name: Breath of Darigaaz
oracle_text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Punishing Fire
oracle_text: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Captive Flame
oracle_text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

name: Ghostfire
oracle_text: Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Seething Song
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: If your flesh can withstand the flame, the spirit of the dragon will burn within your soul.

name: Seismic Strike
oracle_text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."
—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

name: Claws of Valakut
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
flavor_text: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

name: Temporary Insanity
oracle_text: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Shiv's Embrace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Cone of Flame
oracle_text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)
flavor_text: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Jaws of Stone
oracle_text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast this spell.
flavor_text: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.
